scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identifiable by his mitre and crozier, is depicted in a devotional pose, holding an open red book with gold clasps and illuminated pages. He wears a blue cope over a gold dalmatic and a white alb. The background features stylized green foliage and a blue sky, suggesting an outdoor setting. The figure is framed by architectural elements on the left and right, possibly indicating a niche or a decorative border.
